description: Human-readable unique name for the variable.
Categorization of emissions based on their nature (e.g. CO2 - carbon dioxide).
A projected pathway of future emissions based on certain assumptions about economic, technological, demographic, policy, and behavioral factors.
Relate to the division of emission sources into broad segments of human activity.
Unit of measurement for the reported value.
Climate Watch aggregates climate data from multiple sources. Source of the data as reported by Climate Watch.
Unique identifier for a variable, joinable to the timeseries table.
Quantifiable attribute or subject; description of what is being recorded.
